newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS - MIM's Mt Isa has 15 yr copper life.
newsitem.headline: RTRS - MIM's Mt Isa has 15 yr copper life.

text.p: MIM Holdings Ltd said on Tuesday its Mount Isa copper operations in central Queensland had a potential mine life of at least 15 years.
The company said this estimate was based on reserves of 66 million tonnes and 60 million tonnes of resources from the operations and the nearby Enterprise orebody.

"There are substantial reserves of copper, largely in the 1100 (metres) orebody and the deeper 3000 and 3500 (metres) ore bodies," chief executive Nick Stump said in notes for his Essington Lewis lecture to be delivered in Adelaide on Tuesday.
